post.text: Donald J. Trump has written a lot of books about business, but they all seem to end at Chapter 11.

comment.author: Jay
comment.text: I hope her family experiences the pain she has caused so many Americans, people are dying and being raped because of her decisions,,,

replies.author: Tiffani
replies.text: You're delusional!!! Please stop watching too many zombie movies dude!

replies.author: Abdalla
replies.text: Oh sure, she is responsible for the action of ALL others worldwide. What a powerful lady she must be!
